features: Endless Building Possibilities: This building blocks set includes 1120 pieces of vibrant colors for hours of imaginative play. Featuring vibrant colors and easy-to-use pieces, kids building blocks provides hours of creative play and allows for quick and exciting 3D structures. Perfect for shared play with family or friends, it comes with a high-quality canvas storage bag for easy organization and cleanup.(recommended for ages 3 and up)

Safe and Healthy Materials: We prioritize child safety and use only the highest-quality PP plastic raw materials for kids building toys.Building Blocks for Kids are odorless and perfectly safe and healthy for children to use.

Fosters Creativity and Curiosity: With endless possibilities for building, building blocks for kids allows children to explore different designs and experiment with new ideas, fostering their curiosity, innovation, and creativity.

Educational STEM Toys: STEM building blocks is a valuable educational tool that engages children in STEM activities, improving hand-eye coordination, developing color recognition and counting skills, promoting attention and focus, and enhancing brain development.

The Perfect Gift: Ideal for birthdays, holidays, or any occasion,Tigerhu toy building blocks is a fun and engaging way to encourage learning and imaginative play for children ages 3 and up. Order yours today and let the building begin!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1120PCS Building Block Toy Set. This building block set has a sufficient number of blocks, so there's no need to worry about lacking pieces to achieve complex builds. Additionally, it's perfect for sharing and playing with friends and family, allowing children to enjoy party playtime and create lasting memories, while also spending quality time with parents.

Rich color scheme This brand-new fashion Building Blocks set for Kids is composed of small cubes in 8 different colors, allowing children to learn more about color knowledge while enjoying the magical fun of color mixing. Quality PP plastic Kid's safety comes first, the blocks are made of non-toxic high-quality PP plastic, the smooth surface and rounded edge design will not scratch or hurt little hands. Health and Safety Despite the Building Blocks set being made of plastic, these blocks are non-toxic and safe for children, and can be easily cleaned with warm water or a short heat sterilize. High quality storage bag The building block set comes with a high-quality canvas storage bag, which makes it convenient to recycle the building blocks after playtime and cultivates children's organizational skills.

STEM Learning & Educational Toys Children can assemble these blocks into a variety of patterns, including rockets, tanks, lighthouses, and anything else they can imagine. This STEM toys building block set, help develop children's skills in science, technology, engineering, and math, while also stimulating their imagination and creativity.As children build different patterns and structures, they strengthen their hand-eye coordination and teamwork skills, and develop their spatial thinking, problem-solving, and symbolic thinking skills. This set is an excellent tool for improving your child's cognitive abilities and is perfect for both individual and group play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hit in classroom!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for stem bins in my 2nd grade classroom. They have become one of the favorite choices for many of the students. My students have been very creative with the pieces and also enjoy making some of the pieces they have in the booklet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but great toy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my kindergarten students and they are fantastic. I can see their minds working while they twist, turn, and connect them to make what they want. It’s a simple design that really gets the kids thinking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great building toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my pre-k class and they were able to build with them very easily. They discovered that the pieces can bend and they love making crowns. If the rings pop pieces do go everywhere but it’s fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great elementary school building tool
reviews.reviewText: First note: Even though the item says ages 3+, I would not recommend these for anyone younger than kindergarten. The pieces are quite small and could easily pose a choking hazard for any child still putting things in their mouth.For the appropriate age, I love these little blocks. Since every piece is the same shape, you would think it would be easy or boring but it's actually quite challenging figuring out how to build certain things. I plan to use these blocks at a STEM-based elementary school and challenge my students to build a weekly object as well as encourage them to explore with their own designs.I wish there were a few more building suggestions and that the brochure was a little larger because I would like to have a picture displayed each week for a new design and as it is I may have to scan and enlarge or find sample images online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft surface, easy to connect, bendable
reviews.reviewText: Great for those who like soft surface of Lego

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t see a bag and manual. I doubt it's new
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t see a bag and manual. I doubt it's new?! It’s very loose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Endless building opportunities!
reviews.reviewText: These are really fun to build with. The quality of the pieces are nice/sturdy. We liked the colors as well. They also allow for endless creations. We are more of a "lego" family, so I wasn't sure about this product. Definitely different than building blocks, but in a really neat way.I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: is an excellent educational STEM toy. With 1120 pieces, it offers endless creative possibilities for children. Great for enhancing problem-solving skills and creativity
